website_summaries.verdict: This adorable, affordably-priced elf is a great way to share the tradition of the scout elf with your child – a toy that will appeal to both boys and girls.
pros: A soft, huggable elf with a sweet facial expression
19" long – nice length that's ideal for kids who like to carry and cuddle plush toys
cons: Not posable, so you can't sit it on a hard surface like the classic scout elf
Some consumers received the wrong elf

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this elf
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this elf. We didn't feel like getting the whole dang elf kit so we just got this little guy (gal?-hard to tell). We named her Judy and although floppy and probably harder than original elf on the shelf to get into sit up straight we still got her hanging from lamps, curtain rods and propped up against things. We didn't go crazy with intricate set ups and it was mostly just a snugly friend for our 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bruce Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Please specify gender
customer_reviews.text: I will give this four stars because I love the doll and it's big and soft! However, It appeared to be a girl doll or at least looked that way from the picture. The description does not say boy or girl unless I am overlooking it, so we were surprised to get a boy when we really wanted a girl. For half the price of the original smaller elf, I cannot complain too much, as the value is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Mills

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: He's adorable! I can't wait till my daughter wakes up and sees that Elsa (her elf lol) brought a little friend she can TOUCH! He was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Filomena Rago

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son sleeps with his plush elf every night! And he plays a game with the plush where I have to turn my head and not look while my son plays sneaky and moves the plush elf around the house and he tells me the elf moved solely on magic! It's so cute when he does it that I think I love the plush elf as much as my son! So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Haka

customer_reviews.title: He would kid nap the doll for weeks ,lol
customer_reviews.text: My nephew hasn't let this thing go seance last Christmas , he seen it and feel in love literally droped every toy he ever had . He would kid nap the doll for weeks ,lol. finaly gave in a bought him his own . Let's just say I'm the best uncle every day now...lmof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, sweet, and glad this one is more open-ended.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was asking for Elf on the Shelf this year. After reading several reviews, I decided to go with the plushee, as it sounded more lovable and didn't come with the book. This allowed me to make up my own story. Santa Letter for the elf that eliminated some of the "The Elf is Watching if you're naughty" stuff, and turned it into someone who is looking to my girls to be a good example. My daughter loves her elf, and we are having fun with it. It is very soft and huggable and seems well-made. Thank you for being inspiration and adding a bit of lighthearted fun to our Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Geisinger

customer_reviews.title: I love this little elf
customer_reviews.text: I love this little elf. Instead of spending $30 on the traditional elf, I bought this and told the kids that he is even more special because they can actually hold him. I actually really like that my kids have a stuffed elf instead of the hard one. I still have them put the elf on it's shelf at night. But in the morning, the elf always seems to have found some kind of mischief!
customer_reviews.author: All fun and games

customer_reviews.title: Son will be so excited Santa came through!
customer_reviews.text: We have the original Elf on the Shelf in our house, and my son (4), of course isn't allowed to touch him. Well, for Christmas, my son asked Santa for 1 a Zoomer Kitty and 2 a stuffed elf that he could actually hold. "Santa" was ecstatic to find an official EOTS plush on Amazon! Even though I hate giving "christmas" themed gifts on christmas, I'm sure he will love it! It's a little bigger than I expected and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: The Tennessee Home

customer_reviews.title: Love this Elf
customer_reviews.text: This little elf is a great quality. Solid, bright and super cute face. We chose this as an alternative to the $30 plastic elf that has the book. Absolutely think I made the right decision by going with the plush instead of the plastic. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JulianneM

customer_reviews.title: My Five-Year-Old Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My son son was given one of these last year before Christmas. He loved it!! He would go to bed with it and Elfie would magically appear the next morning in either the tree or in some sort of scene set up with his other toys (the best was tied up on his Thomas the Train track set). We moved about a month ago and unfortunately Elfie was misplaced. I ordered a replacement from Amazon last week and was extremely happy with it. It is very soft, the colors are vibrant, and I can't wait until Thanksgiving night for Elfie to make his appearance again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, your little ones will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: As described on the box this is not the original Elf on the Shelf but a companion for your little one, once the Elf heads back to the North Pole. These plush ones are the best to send away tears as they have no magic & can be played with. Your child will thank you. *Note* Read his story on the box and create a magical story for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute elf for the season
customer_reviews.text: Soft and moveable... Had to remove stitching from hands to put a sweater on, then resew and this is a high quality toy! Easy to use for Elf on the Shelf hiding and shenanigans, bugger then the book version, but def cuter too
customer_reviews.author: Barb Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Like it was given from Santa himself!
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you expect. My daughter owns the girl version of this product and my son was able to celebrate his first Christmas with this little elf in his hands. It is soft, cute, and cuddly. Who could ask for anything more. It made my son smile!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Elf on the Shelf....and I have to agree it is much less creepy looking than the original, skinny version :) Please note, that it does not have poseable arms or legs....if that is what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Buck M

customer_reviews.title: Received a Boy Instead of a Girl
customer_reviews.text: On a positive note, I received the Plushee in just a day and a half. Sadly, I was sent the boy doll when I ordered the girl. I wasn't able to return or exchange it, as I had a classroom full of eager children ready to meet "Crystal" the classroom elf. I decided to add a skirt and snowflake earrings to make it look more like a girl. The doll itself is very cute and of good quality but I am disappointed in the carelessness of the order mix up especially since I read on other reviews that this happened a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A. LaBarbera

customer_reviews.title: Lots and lots of fun!  Even with older kids/teens!
customer_reviews.text: Young kids get a kick out of this and look forward to what shenanigans Elf is up to each day. Teens pitch in and help move him, each trying to outdo the other for creativity. It's a lot of fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPioneer

customer_reviews.title: Elf
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size and the softness and sat it on the tree limb and then gave to my little grandson who loves it and calls it Elffie . He sleeps with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Meek

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good toy for kids with a “real” elf at home
customer_reviews.text: This elf is very soft and lovable. I also like the note on the back explaining to the kids that this is a toy elf, not the real elf that they are not allowed to touch.
customer_reviews.author: momteach

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son really liked it! It isn't the standard one you see everywhere, more like a stuffed animal. But you can still use it for the same thing
customer_reviews.author: heaven johnson

customer_reviews.title: Arms and legs cannot be positioned - they just flop
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and our great granddaughter loved it - but it would be better if the arms and legs could be positioned instead of being floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my adult daughter for Christmas. She was so surprised and pleased. Brought out the child likeness in her.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this elf! Irk why people are saying you can’t pose it around the house because I do. I think the original elf looks creepy af so we use this one and my kids (2&4) love him! They still aren’t aloud to touch him also!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My little granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect since this was the first Christmas I introduced the Elf on the Shelf to her. My older granddaughter was very helpful in explaining everything to her. They both took it very seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought I’m going to return this one because I got the „real“ elf on the shelf before this one arrived. But when I got this plush elf I just had to keep it for my daughter! It is so cute, great quality, too! My 7 year old loves it!! It’s the right size for her small hands to hold and cuddle with!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Elf!
customer_reviews.text: We lost our original one and had to order a new one. Looks and Feels the same. Quality is great and got here super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P

customer_reviews.title: Get for young, hyper children!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our friend's child. She's a smart, intelligent 5 year old whom still believes in Santa, but had a tendency to be hard-headed and loud. We used this plush "Elf on a Shelf" as a way of teaching her that even though she doesn't know that being loud and rude is wrong, it is. We move the elf nightly and she runs off to find his new resting place each morning. She even cuddles with him during each Christmas special. Her attitude has changed and she uses her inside voice because santa's helper is always watching. Thanks "Santa"!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Paddick

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: purchased these because my kids were constantly arguing over the Elf on the Shelf. They loved them. They are super soft and cuddly. In fact they love them so much that they won’t put them down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little guy to sleep with
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little guy to sleep with! He had another one and our dog enjoys eating stuffy eyeballs, so we had to part with him. Looking forward to Charlie brining little treats before Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Elf Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Elf on the Shelf was awesome although every day he shows up in a different place. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas must haves!
customer_reviews.text: These Elf on the Shelf are adorable. Not creepy like the other version. They are a great part of our Christmas decorations. We love them. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: debbie le

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. I don’t think it is even 12 inches let alone 17 inches as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Elf
customer_reviews.text: This elf was super cute and larger than expected but not disappointed by that! Great Value
customer_reviews.author: kerry harper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality except for skirt
customer_reviews.text: Kids have loved their plush elf. They've lasted through several years. The only complaint is that the velvo on the girl elf's skirt has stopped sticking together. It didn't seem like great quality to begin with...maybe a snap would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Crock Pot Mama

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters were so sad that their Elf on the Shelf had to go back to the North Pole. So, they were ecstatic when we found this! It came very quickly and has been a hit since the holidays. Every day they have some time with "Adam". Better yet, no fights about touching it! It is so soft and cuddly, very sturdy for a stuffed doll. I think this is one of those toys that help kids of all ages hold on to the Christmas spirit throughout the year!
customer_reviews.author: kiddiejo

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: You need to know the story before you take him out of the box. It doesn't come with a book. The elf comes to your house to watch and listen for Santa . Every night he goes back to the North Pole and reports to back to Santa, then in the morning he is in a different spot in your house. You have to name him and can not touch him, or he will lose his magic. We found him in many places in the house,. He wrote messages on my sons mirror, telling him he needed to clean his room and on the kitchen table, making sugar angles.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Little Al
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy very convenient Little Dale. Should’ve bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Elizabeth Briones

customer_reviews.title: Better deal than the original!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Kids loved it! Was a way better deal than the hard doll with the book!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong gender
customer_reviews.text: I finally got this and it was dirty and the girl. It is supposed to be the boy :(
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this one thinking it was a girl but ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one thinking it was a girl but it's a boy. Doesn't matter to us because it serves the same purpose. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Good

customer_reviews.title: were very sad that their regular Elf on the Shelf had to ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids, especially the youngest, were very sad that their regular Elf on the Shelf had to go back to the North Pole until next Christmas season, so they were thrilled when they got these plush elves to cuddle and play with when they miss the "real" one. They are a good size, seem to be decent quality, and the kids love them. We did cut the threads holding the hands together at the kids' request.
customer_reviews.author: LC, mom to four sons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved the fact she coould play with this elf
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Elf. I opted for this version rather than the plastic faced one, because its softer and just cuter all around. I just wish they incorporated a way to be able to pose his arms easily.
customer_reviews.author: artzyfartzy

customer_reviews.title: great quality great fun
customer_reviews.text: Looove these guys. Had one from Costco since daughter was 3? We have had a lot of fun with Elfie hiding Dec 1-24 and being mischievous. Now i bought the second elf as son is 2.5 and there will be double trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna A.

customer_reviews.title: Hanging on the christmass tree
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rental cabins in Bryson City N.C. and I have hung this on the tree in the main one. will probably purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: jkamara

customer_reviews.title: Replacement elf
customer_reviews.text: We lost our elf during our move right before Christmas so I bought the plush one as a quick and cheaper replacement and he worked just fine. We found the old elf right before Christmas so maybe we will have 2 elves next year or my daughter can play with the plush one as a toy. He looks mad in this picture but is all smiles. The plush one is also not as creepy looking as the plastic face one.
customer_reviews.author: amyldrn

customer_reviews.title: Cute year round substitute for the real Elf on the shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice plush for your child to keep all year while the real elf on the shelf takes a long break till next December. Lol Not much to say but its really cute and my daughter loves it.. If u find your kids wanting to hold on to the real elf all year this is what u are looking for to appease them... Great plush toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Boy Elf on the Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great price and was not available locally. Love the story of the Elf on the Shelf and wish I had when my grandchildren were little. They grow too soon!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, very sweet.
customer_reviews.text: This is second time I have sent as gift for baby. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: beachmom3

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: There is no price tag for the happiness that my son got with receiving this elf from his magical elf that he can keep all year round. It is absolutely adorable and well worth it if your child is into the Elf on the Shelf at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stockslager

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and did the job!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this little guy to keep my twin toddler granddaughters on good behavior during the holidays. My daughter moved it to a different place in the house every morning before they woke up to keep them on their toes LOL. In order to make sure Santa came to their house with presents they had to behave and not act up. They should make this to sit without having to lean it on anything tho.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the arrival of elf each year
customer_reviews.text: The kids ages 7 and 9 look forward to the elf each year.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer_05

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this elf and so does a 5 y/o girl
customer_reviews.author: Christine Drollinger

customer_reviews.title: Way better cost saving option!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much better than spending the $$ on a smaller version. My kids loved him!
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The elf did his job. I wish his hands had velcro so it's easier to hang him from things.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Elf
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a different elf on shelve....she loved this little guy
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plushy
customer_reviews.text: Its nice, but the cost $12.99 is a little steep.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness overload
customer_reviews.text: Like. Will be using pal as part of kindergarten childs’s family project reading fair board with The Elf On The Shelf book.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, he loves having an elf on the shelf that he can hold and sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: smc2109

customer_reviews.title: Comfort doll
customer_reviews.text: Help with getting over the end of Christmas and the elf going back home
customer_reviews.author: joe berchtold

customer_reviews.title: Elf on the shelf, what can I say
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to a bunch of other parents that had to start this tradition, we had to buy this elf on the shelf so my kids didn't feel left out. We have had it for a couple of years now. It is cute and the kids love it. Actually, they want to keep messing with it, despite the warnings that he will report back to Santa. Despite my sarcasm, the quality of this product is good and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Patocki

customer_reviews.title: Made Great-Grand daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: he has asked for this since Christmas and we finally ordered - she is 5 years old - and now it never leaves her side.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Craig

customer_reviews.title: Christmas tradition!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for every house! my son still loves seeing it appear for christmas!
customer_reviews.author: jo ann

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it I needed a new elf for Elf on the shelve
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B

customer_reviews.title: Bonus snuggle time
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters LOVED them! And the snuggle time was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Elf they can touch 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old son loved that he could have his own elf friend to touch and sleep with
customer_reviews.author: EmilyA

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: He is so cute!!! Love the red cheek details! He’s bigger than the plushies ive bought at the store so that was nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: My elf ate too many cookies
customer_reviews.text: He was a bit fatter and larger than I expected but its exactly what my grandson needed to start his Christmas season with the elf on the shelf. PRICED WELL
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Winterly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved being able to have her elf year round to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: "Precious Little Guy"
customer_reviews.text: I saw this Elf on the Shelf featured by a friend on FaceBook. It was so much fun seeing him helping with tasks around the house. The Elf himself is well constructed, the eyes well placed to get everyone's attention. And I believe this may be cute for a child, but it's more fun to be had with adults! Great holiday gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Silk

customer_reviews.title: Kids can play with him
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this. And the kids do too. They can play with him all they want. And it keeps them from feeling bad they can't touch the true elf and take away her magic
customer_reviews.author: Dawn massaro

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: He's soft, cute and cuddly. Perfect elf for less than half the price for the "real" Elf on a Shelf that comes with the book. We didn't need the book because we made up our own story! (He come to the house from the North Pole on Amazon Airways... he sends a text message to Santa every day with a full report on whether or not the girls were good!).
customer_reviews.author: vanbyssum

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the feel of this little guy! It arrived in a few days and I was very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne and Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute elf .. bought it last year ... this year she returned...
customer_reviews.author: stylishmom

customer_reviews.title: ... saw these I thought they were kind of a waste, but I have to say my kids do ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw these I thought they were kind of a waste, but I have to say my kids do enjoy them. We've had them at least since last Christmas. They were excited to bring them back out this year. They are very soft and good quality. I've even machine washed them and they held up.
customer_reviews.author: A. McClung

customer_reviews.title: This Elf looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This Elf looks exactly like the picture!! He is very well made and for the price, it's awesome quality. Absolutely adorable!!! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: HippieEmilie

customer_reviews.title: My children each sleep with their Elf every night.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old daughter was IN LOVE with our Elf. She watched the movie every day, and lit up when she found the Elf but was heartbroken that she couldn't hold him. This was the perfect solution. As always, I had to get one for her older brother as well to be fair. My friends daughter actually stole one of our Elf plush dolls so I have ordered a total of 3 of these things! They're decently priced and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! Wonderful Toy!
customer_reviews.text: These are precious little keepsakes! This was the first year we had an "Elf on the Shelf" and my 7-year-old daughter wanted an elf she could play with. This is PERFECT! I got 2 of these, one for each kid, and they were the favorite on Christmas morning! She can't wait until our 'real' elf on the shelf can meet her lovie elf on the shelf! Perfect gift for any child! Their older cousins wanted one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not Scary Looking Like the Original
customer_reviews.text: This little guy looks over my Kindergarten students during the Christmas season to see if they have been naughty or nice. Works! Although the rule is that they must not touch, it is soft and huggable.
customer_reviews.author: byu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Elf!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as the actual elf on the shelf in a classroom - kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: allison dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. And elf they can touch without losing his/her magic.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Z

customer_reviews.title: Pixie
customer_reviews.text: This Elf on the Shelf brought back memories of the Pixie we had back in the day. Very colorful and sat without falling where placed. The eye stitching is nicely done. This was purchased to be a decoration and not something to be played with so unable to report how durable he may actually be.
customer_reviews.author: M Drum

customer_reviews.title: Best Order
customer_reviews.text: This is for my Grand-Daughter. Awesome idea for the kids they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It's actually soft and cuddly. He sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Timg

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Elfs
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to our boys as a special Christmas tradition. They are really soft and cute but 4yr old seems to not care much for them. 5month old smiles at his...maybe next year lol
customer_reviews.author: STEP_ON_ME_1431

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted an elf he was allowed to touch... this was perfect. It's pretty large and very soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: super cute and soft! too bad the Elf had to go back to North Pole now until next year for Christmas. Kids are loving these hugable and touchable (not really on the shelf) elves.
customer_reviews.author: MonaP

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and am very pleased. The elf is super soft and absolutely adorable. He is a much cuter, more huggable alternative (for a smaller/younger child) to (what I think is) the uglier, felt-material "Elf on the Shelf" doll in the book/box set...and at a much more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JCGagne

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 months old and he loved it. It was nice to have an elf that he could touch. I think it’s much cuter than the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we need
customer_reviews.text: Great budget replacement (alternative) for elf on a shelf. Trick your kids into being good this Christmas by having this elf babysit your kids when you are in another room. Would also make a good toy for younger kids as it is soft and well made. Beans in the bum to help it sit better but very soft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I had lost our previous elf in the move so I bought this one to replace it. It was a good value and the kids never noticed!
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Sims

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Niece wanted one for Christmas like our daughter had...big hit!!!!!! Daughter & niece love there's!!!!! Perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger version of the original...
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Softer, bigger than original. Dislikes: Hands are together - would have liked more of a “huggy feel” but stays true to the original version.
customer_reviews.author: Huff-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Cute option but not easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Cute enough but would be considerably better if he could be attached (wire in body or velcro on hands or something) We tended to tie his hands around things - not ideal but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Just added water

customer_reviews.title: My kids are crazy about this doll.
customer_reviews.text: In short, they can't touch the real EOTS, so they were thrilled to know that they could play with these. They've carried them around everywhere! They're also the envy of other kids because they can tell them all about how they are allowed to touch the elf without him losing his magic!
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: Great christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter had so much fun with it over the holidays
customer_reviews.author: margaret jones

customer_reviews.title: Greta size and super soft
customer_reviews.text: Much cuter plush version of the official elf of the shelf
customer_reviews.author: K. S

customer_reviews.title: Much less creepy!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite elf! The plush version is fantastic for little kids. No scary creepy elf in our house lol. This one is adorable and so much cuter than the traditional plastic elf!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarmagnoliact

customer_reviews.title: Not Chucky
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves it, but more importantly my coworker who bought the original with the book said his elf was scary looking, almost Chucky esque. This one is mush more plush and kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Donal Waide

customer_reviews.title: Everything it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this elf to use as our elf on the shelf instead of the smaller more expensive one. My 2 year old does not know the difference and it worked out great for us. It is the "elf on the shelf" brand. We had a lot of fun with it and can't wait to include it every year in our Christmas traditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for young kids who have a hard time ...
customer_reviews.text: Our seasonal Elf on the Shelf left these behind so our kids would have someone to play with while our other Elf was back at the North Pole. Great idea for young kids who have a hard time not touching the "real elf".
customer_reviews.author: M.Arizona

product_meta.title: The Elf on the Shelf Plushee Pal
product_meta.description:
Durable Product

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Plushee Pals are touchable versions of The Elf on the Shelf pixie scout elf from the North Pole. Unbelievably soft to the touch, these elves are meant to be held and squeezed all year round. Made with the softest material Santa could find – the Plushee Pals are perfect for a child’s loving arms. This Plushee Pal elf is a boy with blue eyes and light skin.
